posts.body: Yes! Love this. Great post.  I played Hot Streak for the first time last night with 4 people. It was thrilling to see someone who was not expected to win at all at the start of the race, end up doing

threads.title: Is this going into regular distribution?

posts.author: fanaka66
posts.body: I'm not seeing it for pre-order at the usual sites.

posts.author: AlxHague
posts.body: Not yet—our distributor has yet to place a purchase order. It’s a little baffling to us but we suspect it’s tariff related. FLGS can email hello@cmyk.games and we’ll hook you up in the meantime!

posts.author: shin0509
posts.body: Is it the same for the UK?

446497.reason: 近期《Hot Streak》上榜的主要原因是其受到玩家的熱烈評價，尤其是在聚會和社交場合中帶來的樂趣和難忘的遊戲體驗。多篇評論強調了遊戲的刺激性和互動性，這使得其在桌遊社群中迅速獲得關注。此外，遊戲的主題和玩法新穎，吸引了不少玩家的興趣，顯示出其潛力。這些因素共同促成了《Hot Streak》的人氣上升。

posts.body: Hi MarkOur first couple of plays were very similar, my sons loved it, my wife was a bit meh and I’d happily never play it again. However, we played it again the next day with a better idea of what was

244521.reason: 《Quacks of Quedlinburg》近期上榜的主要原因是新版本的推出。討論串中提到的升級配件如新芯片和袋子，顯示出遊戲在提升玩家體驗方面的努力，並引發了玩家的關注與討論。此外，相關的詳細評測和熱烈的社群反響也促進了遊戲的曝光度，進一步提升了其受歡迎程度。這些因素共同推動了《Quacks of Quedlinburg》在近期的榜單表現。
